data.name: Moonstone
data.description: Moonstone is a manipulative hypnotist that uses energy blasts to apply Stun and Trauma to her opponents.

starItems.name: Moonstone
starItems.description: Moonstone is a manipulative hypnotist that uses energy blasts to apply Stun and Trauma to her opponents.

1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
If the target is <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color>, gain <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
If the target is <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color>, gain <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
If the target is <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color>, gain <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy.

1.description:
Reduce Speed Bar of the enemy with the highest Damage, excluding the primary target, by <color=#86e619>5%</color> + Mind Control that enemy to attack the primary target.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.
1.nextUpgrade:
Reduce Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>5%</color>
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target

2.description:
Reduce Speed Bar of the enemy with the highest Damage, excluding the primary target, by <color=#86e619>10%</color> + Mind Control that enemy to attack the primary target.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the primary target

3.description:
Reduce Speed Bar of the enemy with the highest Damage, excluding the primary target, by <color=#86e619>10%</color> + Mind Control that enemy to attack the primary target.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
Reduce Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>5%</color>
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target

4.description:
Reduce Speed Bar of the enemy with the highest Damage, excluding the primary target, by <color=#86e619>15%</color> + Mind Control that enemy to attack the primary target.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to the primary target

5.description:
Reduce Speed Bar of the enemy with the highest Damage, excluding the primary target, by <color=#86e619>15%</color> + Mind Control that enemy to attack the primary target.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
Reduce Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>5%</color>
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target

6.description:
Reduce Speed Bar of the enemy with the highest Damage, excluding the primary target, by <color=#86e619>20%</color> + Mind Control that enemy to attack the primary target.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> and <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to the primary target

7.description:
Reduce Speed Bar of the enemy with the highest Damage, excluding the primary target, by <color=#86e619>20%</color> +  Mind Control that enemy to attack the primary target.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> and <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to the primary target.

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, reduce Speed Bar for primary and adjacent targets by <color=#86e619>5%</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Reduce Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>5%</color>

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, reduce Speed Bar for primary and adjacent targets by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>

3.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, reduce Speed Bar for primary and adjacent targets by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Reduce Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>5%</color>

4.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, reduce Speed Bar for primary and adjacent targets by <color=#86e619>15%</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Apply +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>

5.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, reduce Speed Bar for primary and adjacent targets by <color=#86e619>15%</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Reduce Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>5%</color>

6.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, reduce Speed Bar for primary and adjacent targets by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the primary target

7.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the primary target.
 > Reduce Speed Bar for primary and adjacent targets by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

1.description:
On Turn:
 > If this character has at least <color=#86e619>1</color> ally, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color>.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>1</color> or more <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies, heal for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies, Barrier self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus. <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.
1.nextUpgrade: On Turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from the enemy with the lowest Resistance

2.description:
On Turn:
 > If this character has at least <color=#86e619>1</color> ally, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color>.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>1</color> or more <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies, heal for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies, Barrier self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from the enemy with the lowest Resistance.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus. <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.
2.nextUpgrade: On Turn, if this character has at least <color=#86e619>1</color> ally, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>

3.description:
On Turn:
 > If this character has at least <color=#86e619>1</color> ally, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>1</color> or more <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies, heal for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies, Barrier self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from the enemy with the lowest Resistance.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus. <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.
3.nextUpgrade: On Turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies, transfer <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, from self to the enemy with the lowest Resistance

4.description:
On Turn:
 > If this character has at least <color=#86e619>1</color> ally, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>1</color> or more <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies, heal for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies, Barrier self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from the enemy with the lowest Resistance.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies, transfer <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, from self to the enemy with the lowest Resistance.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus. <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.
4.nextUpgrade: On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Focus for self and <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies

5.description:
On Turn:
 > If this character has at least <color=#86e619>1</color> ally, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>1</color> or more <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies, heal for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies, Barrier self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from the enemy with the lowest Resistance.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies, transfer <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, from self to the enemy with the lowest Resistance.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus. <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.
 > On <color=#fff568>OFFENSE</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Focus.
 > On <color=#fff568>OFFENSE</color>, <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Focus.
